profile:
The Home Improvement People have completed literally thousands of renovations since our inception. We are a unique award winning contracting company, consulted by various media as industry experts. 
Please view our website at homeimprovementpeople.com to view images of some of our projects. 
For our clients' convenience, we've implemented progress billing as well as financing.
Regardless of scope, we approach every single home renovation with a foundation of strong design aesthetics, comprehensive product options, sound project management, and a commitment to craftsmanship.
 
Our projects range from remodelled bathrooms and kitchens, to rear additions,  hardwood flooring, basements, second story additions and other extensive renovations. We undertake work in all budget ranges.
 
Choosing a reputable contractor is the most important decision you will make regarding your renovation. From plans and permits, to last little finishing details, The Home Improvement People is committed to completing your renovations and home improvements in a professional manner and to your complete satisfaction.
We take pride in our personalized service and our high quality workmanship. 
Call us for quality, insured work - completed on time, and on budget.
416-782-7605.

profile:
P&P General Contractors Inc. is a family owned and operated business with excellent references provided by many satisfied customers.  With more than 15 years of experience and many satisfied customers our company is strongly committed to provide high quality of craftsmanship to each and every customer.

P & P General Contractors Inc. is a licensed company and for our customer's protection we carry both liability and worker's compensation insurance on all our workers and subcontractors.  We are a start to finish company and we stand behind all projects performed and backs them with a full 1 YEAR WARRANTY.

We take pride in our perform, thus our customers can always be assured that only the most experienced and qualified people are serving them.  Our top priority is our customers satisfaction and our teams objective is to transform your renovation wish list into a reality.

profile: For over 40 years, we have helped Ontario homeowners and builders build safer, more energy-efficient and sustainable communities. With a broad range of products and services, we are your insulation experts for existing home renovation upgrades and new residential home construction—satisfaction guaranteed. Proudly serving all of Southern Ontario, we are Ontario's largest insulation company and are Energy Star and Foam Masters™ certified. Get in touch for a Free In-Home Assessment—contact us today to learn more.

AGM Renovations experts provide quality basement and Bathroom Renovation services throughout the GTA and the surrounding area. See our Service Area for the complete list of towns where our  renovation services are offered. We offer 100% satisfaction guarantee on our workmanship and offer competitive prices with exceptional quality.

Expect more and when you need the best; trust AGM Renovations. We guarantee that you will be completely satisfied, which means that you don't pay until you are satisfied.
Our mission is to be committed to excel in the work we do. We are committed to excel and maintain a sense of pride in our all we do!

products: AGM Renovations, Basement finishing, Basement Renovations, Basement Reno, Finishing Basements, Basement Company, Finished Basements, Basement Expert, Finished Basements Company, Bathroom Renovations
services:
AGM Renovations offers Complete basement and Bathroom renovations packages from the professional design through the professional cleaning including:

Drywall- We employ only professional drywall installers and our goal is deliver complete satisfaction to each and every client with the quality of our workmanship and our prompt, reliable service.
    
Taping- Our drywall taping techniques will bring a high quality smooth finish, with a level of excellence you will take pride in.

Painting- We include all wall priming, painting of ceilings, baseboards, casing, crown and cove moldings into our basement construction packages
    
High Grade Laminate Flooring- is standard in our basement renovations packages.

Tiling- Shower, bathroom, or kitchenette tiling will be done by professional tile installers who are employed directly by AGM. A 2 year unlimited warranty is provided to you standard when you finish your basement with AGM
   
Plumbing- Our licensed plumbers will ensure that no problem is left unsolved and you can be sure that any drain or other plumbing defects left by the original house builder will be fixed effectively.

Electrical- We are committed to providing fully licensed electrician service as part of our standard package. Should you ever require an electrical certificate when you decide to sell your property, we will be happy to provide it to you

profile:
If you want QUALITY, CREATIVITY, RELIABILITY, and an overall ENJOYABLE experience, Purple Properties is the company you're looking for! For nearly 24 years now we have grown to understand what is needed in our market space, now allowing us to service happy clients all over the GTA.  

We have enjoyed producing an impressive body of work, lead by the Vision of our clients. The results naturally happen based on our core principles of PASSION, EXCELLENCE, & COMMITMENT. Our work and knowledge base is extremely diverse. We love to use STONE, HORTICULTURE, WOOD, TILES,  PAINTS along with other materials that become our art, your property being the canvas. Whether your project is interior or exterior, we can help! We look forward to co-creating with you in your next project! 

Purple Properties is fully licensed, insured, and up to date with WSIB. Our insurance and license are valid in the GTA for Interior and exterior projects.

Process:

Call for free estimate: 416-899-1572

Please visit our website at: www.purpleproperties.ca

profile:
Proper construction methods are never optional and home owners have the right to ask questions. Krys Construction knows the Ontario Building Code (OBC) and gurantees a clear walk-through any rennovation. We draw awareness to potential issues. For example, a rennovation with exposed concrete walls and floors can create moisture and cause mildew and odors. With proper construction methods this can be avoided.

"Sketch out your ideas". Always build with the same quality as the rest of your home and sketching your options can be useful when explaining things to a contractor.

profile:
The Home Improvement Group is the premier One Stop Shop for all of your home and office renovations needs.  We have multiple divisions such as Perfect Painter, Affinity Renovations, Perfect Handyman and formally  Mr. Rescue to service all your needs. 

We service work form $400.00 to $500,000.00+ from our Painter and Handyman of the Day Service to  Home Additions and Major Renovation and Structural work.   We want to earn your trust and as a family owned business that delivers on providing outstanding home/office renovation work. 

Not convinced we have enough renovation reviews please see Perfect Painters & Home Renovations Services for a more detailed list on reviews.

We have a commitment to Quality work and dealing with a no risk contractor and we will always compete for your business.


We have also expanded our service areas to include Burlington, Oakville, Milton, Mississauga, Brampton, Toronto, Vaughan, Markham, Newmark, Aurora, Stouffville, Pickering and Oshawa.

Call or email us at sales@thig.pro for all your renovation needs

profile:
We are Ontario’s premier home renovation company. Our experts are passionate about building you the home of your dreams. With over 12 years of industry experience in basement renovations, bathroom renovations, and home-building solutions, we have satisfied hundreds of homeowners. And we’d love to do the same for you for your home renovation.

For all your home renovation needs–whether a bathroom makeover or a basement renovation or Kitchen remodelling, whatever your intentions – we have the know-how to see the job through to success. 

Our team brings the ideas, creativity, and know-how that will make a real difference in your home renovation project, saving you money and finding the perfect combination of style and function.

Founded on basic tenets like fairness and trust, Domilya Group works with you to transform renovation ideas into top-quality results that will leave you with the space you have envisioned. 

Home renovation projects can be stressful, but we take the extra steps to make it hassle-free for you. This becomes possible because of our unique approach, which we feel sets us apart.


Need something installed?  We install it all. All work is done right the first time because we take great pride in our work. 


Redo Your Home Right:

If you need a bathroom, basement, a kitchen or whole home renovations, we provide the materials and know-how.

We know what it takes to protect your home and make it look beautiful. We guarantee all of our work. 


We provide top-notch construction at competitive pricing.

Most of our services are provided to homeowners who want to modernize their residences, such as updating or enlarging an existing kitchen or bathroom, finishing a basement or a complete gut job. We specialize in helping prepare homes for sale and being on time and on budget.   


Home Improvement time is here!
Fast, Friendly, Professional Service with Quality Workmanship. 
Our team will work hard for you to make your renovation dream come true.


We offer:

*Preparing Homes for Sale
*Finishing Basements
*Bathroom & Kitchen Renovations
*Flooring–(Laminate, Hardwood, Carpet and Ceramic, Marble)
*Framing & Taping
*Painting
*Home Remodeling
*Home Renovations
*Electrical & Plumbing (subcontracted to licensed trades-persons)
And much more!


We are geared to delivering specialized home remodeling services to clientele in the Greater Toronto Area, Halton, and Peel Region. Our quality approach and efforts ensure that your renovating project is designed and completed just the way you imagined it.


Let us refurbish your home from top to bottom. 

Here are some examples of the work we do- 
Doors,  Windows, Painting, Backsplash, Kitchen Renovations, Bathroom Renovations, Interior Work, Finishing Basements, Tiles, Faucets & Sinks, Custom Design, Extensions, Drywall, Shower Doors, Drywall Framing, Closet Doors, Shower Enclosures,  Crown Mouldings, General Carpentry, Flooring, Interior Finishing, Floor Leveling, Hardwood, Laminate, Small Renovations, Bathroom Remodeling, Kitchen  Remodeling, Cabinet Installations, Interior Painting, Bathroom Vanities, Laminate Installation, Hardwood Installation, Tub Enclosures, Ceramic, Wall Plastering, Ceiling Painting & Repair, Finishing Basements, Changing Stairs.

profile:
We appreciate all our customers who made us the best award winners of 2018 in Architectural and Structural category including.

We would design your projects the way we did for "Property brothers" and gone on Air!
***

Our goal is to provide High Quality, Economical, Innovative and Sustainable Architectural, and Engineering Solution to meet all of our clients' demands.
Please contact us to book a FREE  question and answer session over the phone on topics such as Building Permit Process, Architectural and Structural drawings.

***

Design-Build projects through our sister and independent company Rigid Frame Builders Inc. We are ready to help you build your dream house whether by interior alterations (open concept; load bearing wall removal), rear addition, second floor addition, basement underpinning for livable basement and second suite and even to build a brand new house or cottage.

***

You can contact us by (416) 276-6298, (905) 903-5197, (416) 901-5446

***

We service the entire GTA, Toronto, Mississauga, Oakville, Milton, Durham Region, Halton Hills, Brampton, Burlington, Markham,Vaughan, York region, King, Stouffville, Aurora, Newmarket, RichmondHill, Pickering, Ajax, Oshawa, Uxbridge

products:
**Structural design and drawings for small to large projects for Architects, Contractors, Homeowners.
**Architectural and Structural design for residential, commercial and industrial projects including City permit applications.
**Design-Build projects through our sister Company Rigid Frame Builders Inc.
**Design of any type of wood, Concrete, steel and light-gauge steel stud framing.
**Design of Building and houses in Conventional or Modern Style
**Design of Pedestrian Bridges.
**Design of access roads to properties and lots.
**3D Model design of Architectural and Structural Projects.
**Preparation of Steel shop drawings.
**Preparation of Steel stud shop drawings.
services: We prepare a full city building permit package for custom homes, renovations, additions, and basements in accordance with Building Code and City by-laws. We offer architectural and structural design and also construction services for new and old buildings and houses in creating open-concept space (load bearing wall removal), rebuilt new houses, house renovations, house additions, mechanical supports, mezzanines with guard rails and stairs, specialty doors and windows supports, retrofit, and steel shop drawing review and many more. we Are into Design-built projects meaning we are One-Stop-Shop.
specialities:
Permit Applications, Architectural and Structural Drawings for building additions, renovations, rebuild, underpinning, walkout entrance for basements. Preparation of steel shop-drawings
Specialized in Designing of:
> Wood structures
> Steel structures
> Concrete Structures
> Load bearing Light Gauge Steel stud structures

 Renovating a house could be a stressful experience.  So, why renovating?
Because we make it easy for you and because just a kitchen, bathroom or a basement renovation will increase the value of your home for future sale or simply  to make your home more comfortable to live in now.
Our team will guide you through this process to make it a smooth and memorable renovation experience. 
 From frame to finish, we do it all . No matter how big or small your renovation project is, we're the company for the job. We are proud of our countless satisfied customers. Choose us for any renovation project, and you'll be glad you did.
 We would welcome the opportunity to earn your trust and help you to transform your living space delivering superior construction and design.
 
Why Green Maple? 
 
We are specialists in Kitchen, Bathroom and Basements Renovations.
 
We start with a consultation to map out your vision, requirements and budget for the projects. From there, we will develop a plan of action for the project and discuss a time frame.
 
Because we want you to feel involved throughout the entire project, you are welcome to get in touch with us at any time.
 
We will explain you what’s going on as the project takes shape, and discuss problems reasonably and will work with you to make the result as good as it can be.
 
We have the technical, business and interpersonal skills, the tools and the experience needed to do the job you want done. 
 
We have experience with projects similar to yours and we know what materials and techniques are needed for your work; and even better, about problems with similar work and how to solve them.
 
We are willing and able to help you refine your plans where possible, resulting in a more desirable and cost-effective project. 
 
We are knowledgeable about the type of work you’re doing and able to suggest ways to get what you want and meet your budget.
 
Before starting the job we will give you a fixed price which includes all the materials, labor, equipment and fees and will put everything in a signed contract.
 
From the initial consultation to the last service, we keep you abreast of our progress so you know exactly what we are doing and how much it costs. 
 
We know how to work efficiently with as little inconvenience to you as possible while still delivering a final product that surpasses your expectations.
 
We will give you one year warranty on all work and if during a year there's any issue we will fix it in a frame time of 24-72 hours after the first call .
 
Our professionalism, affordability and reliability have helped us build a client base that knows that we do not sacrifice quality for price.  
 
Our Company is committed to working within the budget of your project, ensuring that your renovation is completed on time delivering a high quality result.
 
We are also an Eco-friendly renovations company and we can help you to low your energy costs! 
 
Give us a call..! Our best proof of quality is satisfied customers.

We're social here:
https://www.facebook.com/GreenMapleHomeRenovations/

profile:
Why choose The Renovators of Canada?  
 
For over the past 20 years our focus on customer experience has helped The Renovators of Canada grow to locations in Durham, Aurora, Stouffville, Markham, Vaughan, Toronto, Hamilton, Guelph, Kitchener, Waterloo, Barrie, Oshawa, Oakville and Cambridge. 
 
Unique to the industry, The Renovators of Canada provides a 10 year warranty on all craftsmanship. This home renovation warranty protection was established to provide peace of mind as home and business owners contemplate renovating a personal or commercial space. 
 
T-ROC is a fully licensed and insured including WSIB. Other affiliations include memberships with the National Kitchen and Bath Association, CARAHS, Better Business Bureau.  
 
We have a proven track record working with our customers with full transparency in every aspect of your project.  Can’t be present all the time during the renovation process?  No worries, we have specialized client software that allows you to see the entire schedule and pictures as the project happens in real time. We care for your home like it’s our own and always conduct ourselves respectfully and professionally.  
 
With our motivated and innovative professionals we will transform your house and make your dream home a reality.  Visit our website at www.trocanada.com

profile:
RM Renovation is a Toronto based renovation company with more than 20 years experience in the field.
.
WE ARE THE TEAM OF PROFESSIONALS WHO PERFORM KITCHEN, BATH OR BASEMENT RENOVATIONS ACCORDING TO YOUR PERSONAL PROJECT.
.
Our major activities are renovating basements, kitchens and bathrooms at reasonable prices. Trusting such works to us our clients have convinced in their quality and fast performing. We provide high-quality construction and renovation services as well as give maximum guarantee for our services. Depending on the project we perform our interior design, wall insulation and finishing.

Our advantages:

Quality and efficiency. We provide preparing and performing works as soon as possible.
Years of experience. We are in the renovation services market for many years and have an excellent reputation and hundreds of grateful customers.
Individual approach. We approach responsibly to perform each order and find the best options for the task as well as advise customers in order to meet all their individual needs.
Highly qualified specialists. We are a team of professionals and perform our work efficiently and reliably. Our employees keep their skills always according to the up to date requirements.
Customers positive reviews. We have a lot of positive feedback from the customers.
.
.
Basement renovation:

Basement in a private house more often perceived as a technical room: storeroom for garden tools or a cellar to store the harvest. Meanwhile, the basement is easy can turn into a full room to organize here, for example, a vinotheque, bar, home theatre or billiard room. The kitchen in the basement is also becoming a very popular modern solution. Construction and repair of the basement or ground floor, of course, will transform your home by adding not only the living space but also personality.

The following work can be done during the basement renovation.

Waterproofing. This is necessary if the moisture on the room walls revealed.

Heating. If the room is designed for staying long (kitchen, library, bathroom), it should be warm enough in any case.

Thermal insulation. This feature will save on heating and prevent heat loss into the ground and it will greatly enhance the energy efficiency of the whole building.

Lighting. If the basement has a small level above the soil it can be equipped with energy-saving windows. Additional electric light point sources using LED lamps will be created as well.

Soundproofing will be installed if the basement room contains equipment that generates big noise (e.g. water pumps etc.).

Water supply and sewerage. These works are performed accordingly to the local water company. Additional pumps can be installed if necessary.

Networks for the power supply, LAN or television can be laid, so it will provide you with maximum comfort.
.
.
Kitchen renovation:

The kitchen is one of the most visited places in your house. That is why it is so important that this room should be cozy and functional. We will do for you all kinds of our works for any areas of the rooms, from small to large ones. These will be the following:

1. Replacing the wires.

2. Aligning the surfaces of the ceiling and walls.

3. Laying the floor and wall tiles.

4. Floor, ceiling and general kitchen equipment installation.

5. Kitchen windows replacement.

6. Home appliances integration.

We always use safe and easy to wash materials.
.
.
Bathrooms renovation:

We are trying to renovate the bathroom as soon as possible because we well know this room is essentially the most important thing in your home. This type of repair involves the following:

1. Initial preparing the room, dismounting the wires, old tiles and plumbing communications.

2. Installation of new wiring, plumbing pipes, risers.

3. Preparing the walls, floor and ceiling.

4. Installation the new door and windows.

5. Installing the tiles on the floor and walls.

6. Installation of the new ceiling and lighting.

7. Installation of new connections to the water supply and sanitation.

8. Installation of all sanitary equipment and electric wash machine if needed.

We work at any time convenient for you. We are looking forward to meeting you!

profile:
Direct Pro Windows and Doors had been providing quality windows and doors in Toronto and surrounding areas for over 10 years. 

We offer a huge selection of standard and custom built windows, ranging from basic vinyl, single slider and casement windows, to classic options like bay windows and bow windows. Any window we install can also include beautiful interior wood cladding. In addition, we provide quality door installation for residential entrance and exterior doors, front doors, patio doors, sliding doors, and storm doors. In addition to standard materials like wood, wrought iron, steel, and glass, we also offer fiberglass doors made by Weber Manufacturing Technologies.

profile:
Biscaya Home is a company of professionals with backgrounds in civil engineering and general construction. Has a proven record of excellence performing building Inspections, also designing and managing several building and construction projects in Mississauga, Ontario. Basement Finishing in Burlington & Oakville

The kitchen has become the hub of the contemporary household. From involving the whole family in cooking nightly meals to a room without distractions for children to do homework to the perfect setting for a wine and cheese party, kitchens are more important than ever to the 21st century lifestyle. Whether you’re looking to completely overhaul your outdated kitchen or replace individual features such as kitchen cabinets or flooring, Red Stone Contracting Inc. will help you to realize your kitchen renovation vision.
What Can a Red Stone Contracting Inc. Kitchen Renovation Do For You?
The kitchen is undeniably one of the most important rooms in your home. Its complex utility systems and requirements for both style and function necessitate careful placement and focused attention to the individualized needs of each client. Here are just a few of the features that will be considered during a kitchen renovation to help to transform your kitchen into an inviting, functional space.
Layout – Decades of kitchen additions and new afppliances often result in a confusing and ineffective kitchen layout. Our design experts will help you to determine the right floor plan to improve your kitchen’s workflow, lessening stress and wasted time in the kitchen.
Updated Appliances – Many kitchens feature a hodgepodge of appliances and utilities from several different decades. Not only do these strange bedfellows clash stylistically, but they also don’t offer the best performance or highest energy efficiency. Installing modern stoves, refrigerators, dishwashers, and sinks will slash your utility bills and provide the basis for your kitchen’s beautiful new aesthetic.
Kitchen Cabinets – Expand your cluttered kitchen’s storage space with high-quality, durable, and beautiful kitchen cabinets. Our handcrafted cabinets provide innovative storage solutions and lend stunning style to your kitchen, freeing up counter space for food preparation and entertaining and enhancing your kitchen’s contemporary, traditional, or whimsical aesthetic.
At Red Stone Contracting Inc., we believe that the key to a successful kitchen renovation is planning and communication. That’s why we encourage our clients to articulate their specific needs and budgetary restrictions from the get-go. We know that no one understands your individual style or workspace needs better than you. For full kitchen renovations, we let our clients choose to either work with one of our trusted and experienced design consultants or hire their own. Either way, Red Stone Contracting Inc. will accommodate your preferences and work within the design, style, and budgetary parameters of your choosing.
Contact us today for kitchen renovations in Burlington & Oakville
Basements are quickly becoming the new living room: a space for the family to relax and unwind after a long day. Basements don’t have to be musty, dreary storage rooms for old, broken furniture and unused appliances. Red Stone Contracting Inc.’s basement finishing services can turn your dripping, mouldy basement into a dry, warm space for entertaining and living.
Why is Basement Finishing Ideal for the Modern Home?
Modern homeowners often cite storage and space as two of their top issues. If you’re looking for more space in your home but want to avoid the high costs associated with building an addition, basement finishing helps you to utilize what space your home already offers by transforming it into a recreation room, guest suite, home theatre, bar, home office, personal gym, spare kitchen or bathroom, or any other space you can imagine. While rooms above stairs are often reserved for formal get-togethers, basement finishing provides space in your home for more casual entertaining, cozy and private family-only space, or groups of loud teenagers.
Why Choose Red Stone Contracting Inc. for your Basement Finishing?
Basement finishing is unlike any other home renovation project, but many companies treat the basement like any other in the house. They end up using materials that aren’t waterproof and that soon deteriorate in your basement’s climate. At Red Stone Contracting Inc., we understand what it takes to renovate every room in your home. We strive to use high-quality and durable waterproofing materials that will withstand the worst of what the Oakville and Burlington weather has to offer. Basements are often the centre of your home’s utilities and store such vital equipment as your furnace and water heater. Our expert staff understands how to work around these fixtures so that they continue to function as normal, but do not obstruct your beautiful new design.
The under-utilized basement is among the most versatile and customizable spaces in the modern home. Every homeowner’s vision for their completed basement finishing project is vastly different, which is why we offer so many flooring options including wood, tile, parquet, and carpet, endless paint colours and finishes for your wall panels, a variety of crown moulding designs and ceiling tiles, and numerous options for lighting from suspended lighting to task and pendant lights. The basement of your dreams is within your reach. Contact the dedicated and passionate home improvement experts at Red Stone Contracting Inc. today to bring your kitchen renovation, basement finishing, or bathroom renovation vision to life.
Contact us today for basement finishing projects in Burlington & Oakville
Kitchen Cabinets in Burlington & Oakville
Whether you’d like to revitalize your kitchen without the expense and stress of an entire kitchen renovation or are still in the initial planning stages of remodeling your kitchen, take time to think over one of its most essential features: kitchen cabinets. In our experience, installing the right kitchen cabinets for your space can be the best and most cost-efficient way to both improve your kitchen’s function and update its style.
The kitchen has increasingly become the focal point of the modern home, serving as a place to eat, gather, entertain, and even work for many contemporary families. Free up extra counter space to prepare family meals or present a spread at a dinner party by upgrading your kitchen’s storage system.
What’s Special About Red Stone Contracting Inc.’s Kitchen Cabinets?
Red Stone Contracting Inc. offers durable, high-quality, handcrafted or off-the-shelf kitchen cabinets to fit your individual needs and budget, transforming your cramped, cluttered kitchen into a pleasant space to which friends and family will naturally congregate. We will help you to increase your kitchen’s storage space by carefully designing kitchen cabinet placement and working within your kitchen’s space to find innovative solutions to keep more in less storage space.
We offer an extensive range of kitchen cabinet styles, colours, materials, and finishes that will complement the aesthetic of every kitchen from contemporary to rustic to traditional. Choose from different door overlays, shapes, and patterns such as beaded insets or decorative glass inlays. Kitchen cabinets can be finished to complement nearly any colour in your kitchen or enhance its character with the vintage feel of crackles or distressed finishes.
 
At Red Stone Contracting Inc., we take pride in offering the best services to our customers for projects both large and small:
Value and Cost – We strive to find the intersection of high-quality materials and construction with cost-consciousness.
Personal Contact – The project manager works with clients throughout the renovation process, pursuing and continuing a productive dialogue.
Expertise – We use only the best staff, tools, and technologies to get the job done right the first time.
With over 10 years of kitchen renovation experience under our belt, Red Stone Contracting Inc. has become one of the leading contracting companies for kitchen cabinets in Oakville and Burlington. Our expert craftspeople are dedicated to meeting your design specifications and your budgetary needs to give you lasting and beautiful kitchen cabinets.
Contact us today for your kitchen cabinets in Burlington & Oakville
Tile Installation in Burlington & Oakville
Not much is less appealing than dirty and deteriorating flooring or walls. Family members and guests will be loath to step on stained carpeting, tiling with mouldy or dirty grout, or pieces of broken-off wall. Update your home with a beautiful new tile installation from the flooring experts at Red Stone Contractors. From design to installation, our highly trained staff will ensure that the tile installation for your kitchen, hearth, patio, or bathroom renovation fits your needs in terms of function, style, and finance.
What are the Benefits of a Tile Installation from Red Stone Contracting Inc.?
Flooring and walling are often at the very back of our minds until something goes wrong. Flooring plays a vital role in the look and feel of a room, either enhancing its aesthetic and design or detracting from it while varying tile wall textures add elegance and sophistication to any room. Tile is ideal for surfaces that are constantly splashed with water and need to undergo regular cleaning such as kitchen and bathroom floors. Our materials comply with the latest industry standards for durability, ease of maintenance, and water resistance, and our cost-efficient and high-quality tile installation will last for decades, despite the unforgiving climates of your bathroom or kitchen.
Flooring and walling are dramatic and powerful design elements that bring cohesion and flow to every other feature in a room. At Red Stone Contracting Inc., we offer the latest trends in our tile installation to complement your home’s style. Choose from among our many tile materials and aesthetics.
Ceramic – This clay tile is among the most popular and versatile floor materials. It can be characterized either as porcelain – which gives the tiles a glassy appearance — or non-porcelain.
Stone – Classic natural stones such as marble, granite, slate, and limestone add instant elegance to any room’s flooring or walls.
Shapes – Tiles can be cut into octagons, circles, diamonds, rectangles, or a wide range of other shapes to fit your design preferences.
Colours and Finishes – While neutral tile tones allow you to play up other design elements, brightly coloured tile can be a bold statement or add character to a kitchen or bathroom. Choose from shiny acid wash finishes, weather brushed finishes or rough split-faced finishes that add texture to your home.
Begin your bathroom or kitchen renovation project with tile installation from Red Stone Contractors. For over 10 years, Oakville and Burlington residents have trusted our attentive and dedicated staff with their home improvement projects.
Contact us today for tile installation questions in Burlington & Oakville
Red Stone Contracting give us a call and experience the difference. 905 901 1006 +1 (888) 667-6925

profile:
For all your flooring needs!

Headquartered in Toronto Ontario Canada; MST is one of the pre-eminent flooring companies operating in the southern Ontario region. Our main focus at MST is to cater to the customer and provide them with exactly what they need and want.

Day or night, local or out of town, we are the best choice for your flooring needs.

Founded in 2016, MST has grown to become a leader in flooring installation, family owned and operated since its start is what makes MST the great company it is, and your number one choice.

With regards to this unsteady market and with full awareness of our clients expenditures involved in this new market place MST rates are still one of the most competitive in the market.

Wether it is private, public, residential, commercial, large or small we will confidently take on any project and with almost 2 decades of experience, complete that project to your satisfaction…. We won't leave until you are completely satisfied – it is our guarantee!

When you entrust MST with your project we will utilize every inch of space in an innovative aesthetic and functional manner, giving you the exact look that you or your clients are aiming for.

Our reputation of having a solution-focused project team to deliver optimum service is another factor, which sets as apart from our competitors. Working on some of Toronto's greatest landmarks and with major corporations has given MST a firm grasp on client driven results under the most rigorous schedules and time frames.

How would you like new floors, enclosures, and backsplashes that reflect uniqueness and appeal throughout your residential or commercial property? Count on our company, MST, for detailed tiling work that breathes more life into your home or business. profile:
Heptagon Renovation is a dynamic, innovative home builder and renovations company that is versatile enough to tackle any style of challenge from condos to mansions, and in any style of design from traditional to modern. We believe in approaching each project uniquely to suit the needs and desires of each client.

***

OUR APPROACH
We believe in getting the job done right, the very first time and that’s why our team of experts takes optimal care and precision to enhance your home ambience with premium craftsmanship. After consulting with you about every single detail, we plan the entire project – a renovation plan that will delight you! With years of experience in renovation, remodelling, construction and design, we proudly claim that we are one of the best people in the business. With plenty of competitors in the market, we stand tall as the best professionals for our flawless planning and perfect execution of work.

Our work methodology and approach is simple and we believe to follow the middle-path and get things done in a hassle-free manner, within competitive rates. Again, quality doesn’t come cheap. So, for lavish home styles, we cater to the demands and make sure the prices are reasonable enough. Our client-oriented approach makes us an instant favourite. However, we make sure to bring finesse and provide some finishing touches based on the taste of the client. We make dreams come true like literally we do so!

****

OUR STORY
Our love for all things beautiful has brought us to this platform. We love to renovate homes and create something beautiful that’s soothing to the eyes, yet attractive enough to catch the eye! With an eye for perfection, we believe that all things beautiful that are created need futuristic planning. Our founder wanted to satisfy his creative urge and that’s why renovating a home, remodelling and makeover were chosen. Meticulous craftsmanship is our forte and the design planning is done beforehand to ensure perfection. Taking small steps at a time, today we have innumerable happy clients all over the place. They come to us repeatedly, not for remodelling of the same project, but to beautify their existing homes.

We have always won our client’s satisfaction so we never went back to do repairs to our work. Our story is not a fairy tale, from Canada, Ontario, Mississauga we began and expanded to GTA zone and surrounded areas. We had faced struggles, but we have dealt with them and now we are a success story! Our struggles have made us stronger and better.

profile:
Finding your perfect home renovation partner can understandably be a daunting process these days. With so many options and potential risks, people are looking for a partner they can trust.

That's why Royal Home Improvements (RHI) retains single-source responsibility from start to finish. Our hand's on approach ensures your needs are met, from concept to construction. Whether architectural design, the quality of construction, or our strict adherence to timelines and budget, RHI guarantees everything we do and make sure that our customers are satisfied with every facet of our work.

Building trust takes years of delivering on time and budget. It requires committed professionals and a refined process model. But ultimately, it's about respect and owning ones word. This hasn't changed since we open our doors in 1969. Proudly serving the Greater Toronto Area, Royal Home Improvements today is one of the largest multi-phased renovators in Canada.

What can we do for you?

profile:
Owning a home is one of the most important financial and sentimental assets that one can have. Beyond building a financially reliable base, you want a home to match your lifestyle and your dreams. When you work with TK Contracting, you’re going to be getting a service that exceeds all expectations through our licensed and bonded tradespeople. 

Our Company
We at TK Contracting Inc.  Are passionate about the work we do. Our commitment is to work with our clients in order to achieve the best results in the project with a safe and timely manner.  We are dedicated to provide our clients with a high level of satisfaction. 

Heath and Safety Protocols
Our policy at TK Contracting is to maintain a safe working environment for everyone. Compliance with health and safety regulations are all outlined in the health and safety policy of TK Contracting.  Our employees are all trained yearly to follow these safety protocols. In order to reduce the risk of injuries at the workplace. 

COVID19 Precautions 
To keep our clients and workers safe, all workers will have a temperature check, and a log to record. All workers shall sanitize before Jobsite, and wear a mask during the entire day. TK Contracting makes sure every team member is tested before working. We are one of the few companies who follow these precautions.

Guaranteed Workmanship 
Our company ensures that each project is handled with good quality materials and professional knowledge to achieve the highest level of satisfaction. We provide a quality service on every project. TK Contracting offers a free written guarantee of 12 months from the date of completion.

profile:
Established in 1995, Clearspan Construction is an Oakville-based renovation company that serves homeowners from Hamilton to Toronto. We pride ourselves in bringing your ideal home to life. Our experienced team is dedicated to delivering high-quality work at exceptional prices. 
Clearspan Construction takes great pride in creating architectural interest, symmetry and balance to any living or working space. We focus on high-end residential reconstruction, working with designers, architects, business owners and private homeowners to create an architectural vision and design harmony. We specialize in building creative interiors from the imaginations of designers and architects who implement ideas from private homeowners.

Throughout our 25 years in business, our experienced team of licensed tradespeople has built store interiors, remodelled condos, commercial offices suites and residential custom interiors including bathrooms, spa suites, solariums, beautiful kitchens, custom basements, fireplaces, built-in cabinets, home offices, and home theatres.

profile:
Master Of Consistency and Quality specializing in : Basements, washrooms, kitchens, hardwood/laminate flooring, decking/fencing.

Roger Caissie came to Toronto from New Brunswick when he was just 16. Right off the bat, he took a couple of odd jobs as a handyman, eventually only to join his brother and his partner Ray in their drywall and taping business. With time, Roger grew to learn more about not just drywalling and taping but also about other aspects of construction. 

Once he had several years of experience under his belt and had been exposed to all aspects of construction and home renovation, Roger founded RJ Renovations.

At RJ Renovations, Roger didn’t want to force his choices on his clients, like the rest of his competition did to make more money. He wanted to leave that choice entirely to the customer so they could build something of their imagination and stay within their budget. Roger also operated with his mantra, which eventually became the business’ mantra: Doing it right the first time is cheaper than doing it over. This is why Roger and his entire team don’t believe in taking shortcuts when working on a project. They do things the right way first time around which leads to total and complete customer satisfaction by the end of the project. 

Roger’s a seasoned trades person with over 45 years in the industry, all by himself. Couple that with the experience of the rest of his team and we’re talking over 75 years of hard earned experience in construction and home renovations, but more importantly in helping people realize their home renovation dreams.
name: RJ Renovations

Northern Castle Construction is a professional home renovation and contracting company that specializes in project management and residential renovations. The company was founded on the strong belief of providing high quality residential renovation service, while also building strong client relationships in the process. The Northern Castle team works hard to guide you along every step of the renovation process, maintaining open and ongoing communication, while helping to set realistic expectations and timelines with you.

Jordan Duster has brought together a group of individuals that share his passion for quality work. profile:
Paul made his way into the home renovation industry in 2017 with the hope of being a different kind of renovation company. What does that mean? It means full transparency and not overpromising. It means telling our clients that there will be noise and dust and days of frustration. Things will go wrong, but we will fix them. We will work hard to communicate daily, to ensure the end product is all you've been dreaming of. Paul and his team are committed to a professional process, full transparency, and the very highest quality possible.

One of the main reasons our clients choose us is because we put your mind at ease. We’re with you at every phase of the renovation, from the initial planning and materials selection, to buildout, to finishing and even after the fact, if you have details you’d like to add. There’s no coordinating between multiple sources or trying to keep track of a dozen bills. There’s just us and you, working together to create a home that’s truly one of a kind.

profile:
***NEW TO THE HOMESTARS COMMUNITY!!***CHECK OUT OUR GALLERIES TO SEE OUR CURRENT PROJECTS!!

We are a family owned and operated General Contracting company, based out of Hamilton.

Our workforce consists of several different professionally skilled tradespeople, which enables us to complete jobs efficiently, on schedule, and more importantly, on budget. We out perform the competition with attention to detail and second to none workmanship, we treat your home as if it were our own. We understand how stressful and daunting a renovation can be to a homeowner, we will help you through the process and offer our services at a fair price. 

Our Services Include:

New build - We have the experience and knowledge to build your home from the ground up

Additions - Whether its an additional floor or an extension of your current floor plan

Kitchens - We have an EXCELLENT cabinet maker with great pricing 

Multi-room renovation - You'll see our consistent workmanship spread out over many rooms in your home

Basements - If your basement is finished or unfinished, we will build it exactly how you envisioned it, and exceed your expectations. 

Bathrooms - We have a Master Plumber on our team, any and all plumbing issues will be expertly completed 

Tiny Homes - A GREAT income for your backyard! Rent income pays for the tiny home itself!

Entire home renovation - We'll transform your house into your dream home.

We will take care of all the leg work including acquiring all permits and surveys. We are happy to work with your designs and preference or provide design consultations and advice.

Our entire team of Licensed, (Insured & WSIB Protected) master trades are committed to providing service of the highest quality, paying particular attention to work efficiently and expediently while keeping all lines of communication with our clients clear and concise. We have built a successful track record of over 3,500 completed projects, resulting in over 3,500 permanent smiles from happy homeowners all over the GTA West! 

We pride ourselves in our ability to deliver on schedule and within budget... Every time! It is our goal to not only meet... But to EXCEED your expectations. No job is considered complete until you are 100% satisfied with our work. Period.

At Re-Nuitt Builders, we offer our customers honesty, quality and well-priced workmanship, guaranteeing that you will fall in love with our complete service! In order to maintain this standard of quality control for well over 25+ years, we had to make sure that we were building a top notch in-house team of Master Tradesman, from the START. We are proud to to say, that 100% of our work, crews and certified professionals, are all exclusively working with our Re-Nuitt Family.

This way, we make sure to overdeliver on our promise, of guaranteeing you the highest quality work, customer service, faster timelines, and maintaining 100% of the control at all times, to ensure that we exceed your expectations, no matter how big or small the job might be.

We like to have full control of the project from start to finish by using our exclusive Team of Diverse Master Trades that we are extremely lucky to have. We offer a confident 2 year warranty which is backed by customer protection in the form of Workers Compensation Board (WCB) coverage and a $3,000,000 liability insurance policy.

profile:
Dorval Homes is a high-end custom building company specializing in new homes, additions, and renovations in the Greater Toronto Area.  With over 10 years in the GTA, our rich heritage isn’t to be understated – and discerning homeowners and leading architects have come to rely on Dorval Homes for exquisite attention to detail and comprehensive knowledge of master home-building.  

The happiness of our customers is our singular goal.  Creating joy in our customers’ experience is the byproduct of combining our superior building systems with a rugged moral code emphasizing honesty and fairness.  

Dorval Homes is highly conscious of a project timeline and budget and has proven methods for delivering on both.  These advantages are conveyed to each client through a dedicated team and a highly transparent project management process.  

Additionally, Dorval Homes' 3-year warranty reflects our higher level of service after the job is done, as well as confidence in our craftsmanship.  This means that if there is any follow-up work, or request, long after a project has been completed, we promptly take care of it.  Think of us as your long-term, accountable partner.
name: Dorval Homes

profile:
A Full Range of Personalized Design-Build Services

Specialized in multi-room renovations and design, kitchen renovations and design, bathroom renovations and design, basement renovations and design, deck and fence building and design.

Proven to be one of the top home renovation companies in Hamilton, Milanos All-Star Construction Inc. consistently delivers excellent service and high-quality results. We start with quality materials, and we take the time to educate our clients about the differences between choosing hardwood or laminate, marble or granite. Next, we follow the project management method for custom renovations, which means open communication and fair prices, often at wholesale cost. Finally, we set deadlines, and we meet them! Our goal is to cause as little disturbance to your life as possible. Our clients come first in all that we do, so you can count on us to be there every step of the way, whether it’s giving you an update at the end of every day or honouring or maintaining a clean workspace.

Whether you are looking for upscale complete home renovations, a one of a kind custom built home, or perhaps a room specific renovation such as a kitchen, basement, bathroom & ensuite or custom cabinetry and millwork built-ins; Milanos All-Star Construction Inc. offers a full range of services to suit your needs.

Give us a call today to book your FREE consultation.

Process
Get a professional assessment.
Plans/Drawings
Scope of Work/Cost Estimate
Prepare for budgeting and planning.
Presentation of Design & Budget.
Sign Contract & Provide Deposit
Permit Application.
Begin Construction.
No Hidden Costs
Once we work together to understand your dream renovation goals, we put together a detailed plan and proposal that includes all costs and expenses in your project. That way you’re never met with an unexpected expense during or after your renovation.

Quality Workmanship
Our quality workmanship can be seen throughout Ontario. We have completed many custom building projects for our clients throughout Hamilton, Stoney Creek, Burlington, Oakville, Binbrook, Grismby and Niagara Region. We are committed to excellence, our Customer Satisfaction Is Our Standard.

Our Services:

RENOVATIONS

Home Renovations, Additions And New Builds Done Right. Every Time.
We at Milanos All-Star Construction Inc. specialize in renovations and provide quality workmanship with competitive pricing!
We have an absolute passion for the renovation industry and we exceed in providing our clients with the utmost communication with a 100% satisfaction guarantee.
Our team has over 15 years of experience and together we will deliver your dream in to reality. At Milanos All-Star Construction Inc., complete customer satisfaction is our only concern.


KITCHENS

Milanos All-star Construction Inc. is Hamilton’s award-winning Kitchen Renovation Company of choice.
Milanos All-star Construction Inc. has the experience, know how and skills to get the job done, and the track record to back it up.
We believe a well-built, well-designed kitchen speaks for itself. Our strength is making kitchen renovations easy by eliminating the guesswork. Our customers appreciate the simplicity we offer where everything they need can be picked under one roof and installed by our very own in-house trades.


BATHROOM

We provide the skill and craftsmanship you need to create the bathroom you’ve been dreaming about.
We are bathroom renovation specialists in Hamilton Area and provide the craftsmanship and planning so you get what you want.

Custom Vanities
Whirlpool Bath and Spa
Custom Shower Enclosures
Custom Tile and Stone
Radiant Floor Heating

BASEMENTS

Milanos All-Star Construction Inc. Hamilton’s Premier Basement Renovation Company.
Milanos All-star Construction Inc. is top basement renovation contractors in Hamilton, we consistently delivers excellent service and high-quality results. Our passion for building new custom basement projects drives us, reflecting who we are as a company and what we do for our clients. Whether your goal is to have extra space for your family, a comfortable office to work from home or just a place to relax, the possibilities are endless. As basement experts, we take this seriously. Our team is creative, efficient and meticulous.


OPEN CONCEPT STRUCTURAL DESIGN

Looking for a Open Concept Design?

Our team removes the guesswork that is typical among home building and renovations. Beyond the aesthetics, our approach to designs ensures highly accurate estimates and clarity of the results before the project begins.
From new builds to renovations, we will manage all the details throughout every stage of the project. We will keep you updated with the progress and ensure the site remains clean and secure.



FRAMING

Need a skilled carpenter to finish your home projects?
We have the skill and experience you’ve been looking for. We tackle all-size projects from an entire house to a single doorway.


PAINTING

Hamilton Painters that get job done Right!
A new coat of paint will bring new life to any space. Let us show you how our affordable Hamilton painting services can bring life back to your space!
Our Painting is done by experts who know what it takes to deliver excellent results. We do not subcontract our painting projects, which means consistent results and service every time.


FENCES

If you need to build a fence, we can get the job done. Wood or composite anything is possible.
Whether you need commercial fencing, residential fencing, automated gates or a high quality, affordable access control system we have what you need.
We have years of experience in woodworking, we take pride in our work & love what we do.


DECKS

Nothing is too big or too small, from terraced decks to a small porch out front. We can tackle any type of deck project you may have.


LANDSCAPING

Landscapes big and small, we offer value-packed outdoor enhancements.
Our goal is to ensure you are satisfied with the results we provide – that’s why our landscaping services are diverse and flexible. We can customize your landscape design and construct your outdoor yard to how you desire it to be. Our landscaping serves in Hamilton, and surrounding areas! Schedule a meeting with our landscape designer today.
We specialize in one of a kind outdoor living spaces with a focus on superior craftsmanship and personally ensuring our clients satisfaction. We’re proud to go the extra mile to help you create a personal oasis that is built to last. From design to completion every step of your project is completed by owner and builder Milan Luka, ensuring your project is built to the highest level of quality with unmatched craftsmanship.

profile:
Established in 2020, we are a small carpentry business located in Norfolk County, Ontario. Before we opened, our owner Bryan, had over 5 years installing in the trim and door industry. After many years of working for someone else, he decided to take the leap and open Carpentry4U. Although we are a small team, this works in our favour as we are able to really give hands on training to new employees and build our experience and knowledge as a team at a pace that works for each individual. 

Since opening in 2020, we have gained experience in decks, fences, flooring, fireplace accent walls, stairs, and many home renovations that involve reframing and drywalling, bathrooms and kitchens.

profile:
Hello Viewer! 

We offer full turn key solutions for interiors and exterior renovations for a variety of building types. Working at a range of scales, from custom renovation projects for residential market to adaptive reuse of small commercial buildings. The team lists beauty, practicality, and social and environmental sustainability as essentials for ‘healthier and happier buildings’.  


We specialize in the design and renovation management of a variety of spaces which can differ in size and function.  It is through our free consultation that  a picture is painted on what your project and budgetary requirements are.   We will hold your hand as tight as you require and ensure that we listen to your wants and needs.  Once we have a clear picture of scope and budget, our team will estimate and design your space for you accordingly with years of experience and education backing our every decision.   


There is no project to small and no renovation project to large for us to handle.  
-We work with a variety of agents who have clients moving into their new 2 story properties or condos which have very tight time lines.  We have accomplished full 3 story (including basement) renovations in 5 weeks flats when necessary.  
-We have many recurring clients which use our services for each challenge they face.  If you aren't ready to do a full project in a single swing,  we can help you break down the project into proper stepping stones to spend where necessary and when necessary. 


We are a phone call or email away and would be honored to work with you.

profile:
Style Renovation LTD.   Professional residential renovations can breathe new life into your home. Whether you are seeking renovations to just one room, the whole house, the exterior or the interior, The Style Renovation LTD can provide you with everything you need from design to planning to execution, with our building supplies in Oakville & Mississauga & Burlington & Toronto

Whether your renovation requirements are something very practical such as updating an outdated kitchen or whether you would like to splurge on a home room for your basement, Style Renovation LTD are prepared to take care of your residential renovation needs. 

Home Renovation:
Of all home renovations, kitchen and basement remodels offer the best financial return. But there’s a caveat with basements: the quality of the new space must match the rest of the house to warrant asking for a higher selling price.

profile:
Founded in 1997, Maher Construction had become a full service management and construction company that includes new construction, interior fit-outs, construction management, interior design and architectural services.  Maher Construction has built a reputation on, and is committed to, working within the budget, ensuring that all projects are completed as per scope and schedule, and delivering the highest quality of work and service to our clients.

Each project is given personal attention by its principal Larry Maher. By maintaining an open line of communication with each member of the project and providing a leadership role throughout the construction phase, Maher Construction ensures the integrity and quality of each phase of the project. As a result, we are proud of our extensive list of repeat clients.

Our continued success is also due to our long-term relationships with clients, sub-trade contractors, consultants and employees.

Reliable is a trusted construction corporation since 2014 with many services to offer: 
● Full Renovations & Designs
● Interlocking / Concrete / Asphalt
● Retaining Walls / Waterfalls
● BBQ Kitchen Iceland / Firepit
● Garden Beds / River Rocks
● Stepping Stones / Patio Stones
● Lawn Replacement / Fences
● Commercial Snow Plowing
  And much more!

Reliable specializes in residential homes, industrial and commercial properties. We are based in Mississauga and service most of GTA.
Our goal is to create and maintain the highest level of customer service for all of our clients. Today property owners recognize that looks are everything. Well maintained grounds put owners in a positive frame of mind and contribute to the impression that the rest of the property is well maintained. Let our dedication to excellence go to work for you, we can enhance your curb appeal, property value and the landscape environments around your property. Well maintained grounds tell the world of your attention to detail and the pride you have in your property.

profile:
A thoughtfully designed outdoor space will make you never want to go back inside. Have us create and care for yours. Providing comprehensive solutions in the Greater Toronto Area.

Customer Satisfaction Guaranteed

From the moment you phone us through the completion of your landscaping project, our professionals will make sure that your experience with us is top-notch. Our team pays special attention to all details in projects and will regularly communicate with you till the project is complete. Our priority is to ensure the complete satisfaction of every client.  

We are trained to help clients increase the value and curb appeal of their homes by creating an outdoor environment beyond their imagination. We work together to create elegant landscape designs with the help of our team of landscape designers. We work closely with our customers when designing the space to ensure the complete satisfaction of the results of their project.   

Get In touch!

We strive to be in constant communication with our customers until the job is done. If you have questions or special requests, just drop us a line. To schedule and free quote press the "Get a Quote" button on the top left of our profile. For any further details on our Luxe Landscape and Construction Inc. feel free to visit our website!

profile:
At ACG INC we build homes, not houses! 

Our experts have been providing quality general contractor services to our valuable customers since 2017. We offer 100% satisfaction guarantee on our workmanship and we offer competitive prices with exceptional quality. Regardless of scope, we approach every single home renovation with a foundation of strong design aesthetics, comprehensive product options, sound project management, and a commitment to craftsmanship. We are transparent with your project from start to finish, ensuring that the final product meets your expectations. We will also happily assist you with obtaining permits, choosing design and  architecture. 

Choosing a reputable contractor is the most important decision you will make regarding your renovation, so you can reach out to ACG INC. with upmost confidence.

profile:
BRIKS (Verb/ Noun/ Adjective): Bespoke. The Art of Luxury, Redefined.

BRIKS Design-Build Group is a TARION Registered Boutique Firm, specializing in Luxury New Build Construction of Custom Residences. We offer a Full range of the Best-in-Class General Contracting Services, including Transitional Renovation and Remodeling, Kitchen Designs, and Interior Design for Residential and Commercial Clients throughout Toronto.

The construction of your home may well be the largest investment you ever make, and is a huge undertaking. Simply put, this is not the type of job in which you can leave anything to chance. When you work with BRIKS Design & Build for your new and remodeling construction projects in the G.T.A., nothing will be overlooked. 
With our experienced team of renowned Architects, Interior Designers, Engineers, and Sub- Trades; we assure you that every detail of the construction project, from initial designs to site plans, and from construction to the materials sourced and used; will only be of the highest level of caliber that we work with. Whatever your vision of your new home may entail, our bespoke BRIKS team will ensure that it is fully realized.
As a leading Design-Build Firm in the G.T.A. , not only do we provide detailed site and architectural plans from some of the most reputable Architects in Canada, but we also assist with every part of the building process. From applying for permits, to laying the foundation, to your BRIKS Pre-Delivery Inspection; we are truly your one-stop shop for all your construction needs. 
Over the last 20+ years, we’ve earned the trust of residents throughout the G.T.A. region, and we would love an opportunity to earn your trust and business.

Our project starts by meeting our client, visiting the site and provide a quote for the cost of the project.

profile:
NO PROJECT TOO BIG OR TOO SMALL
Our main focus with small or large scale construction projects is to develop a clear understanding of your individual needs & budget. 
No matter how small or big your project is, we will strive to find a solution for your budget!

10 Years of Experience
If you’re looking for a friendly, fast, and affordable residential renovation company, MONTEMAYOR GC  has everything you need. 
As a locally owned business, we understand the unique needs and expenses that are associated with homeownership. 
We’re homeowners ourselves and we want you to be happy with our services. 
Our team of professionals has the necessary experience, equipment, and attitude to get the job done right—every time!

Our Mission
Here Montemayor GC we perform the highest level of quality service at fair prices and ensure complete customer satisfaction. 
We deliver professionalism, integrity and honesty with every job we take on.

We have maintained and continue to develop trusting relationships with our suppliers and customers. 
We strive to always provide an efficient service that will increase the lifespan of your walls and furnishings so that you, your family and friends can enjoy the living space you have always wanted. 

We only use the most advanced materials. You can rest assured that all jobs are handled with care; whether big or small.
To us, all restoration and renovation projects are important, and we strive to provide results that exceed your expectations.

Give us a call - 647-202-7085

A licensed, bonded and insured Contractor with the City of Hamilton and over 25 years of experience, Corcoran Construction can help you with any job, big or small: Full scale construction projects or small household repairs.

Your needs will be met with the utmost professionalism. We are built on courteous, polite service, and open communication. Corcoran Construction ensures your project will run stress free right from the start with returning messages quickly and showing up ON TIME. 

Sometimes large companies can be daunting to call, when all you need is a couple of hours to repair something. Bigger companies can also be an issue for large scale projects, with the lead sub-contracting others to do the job. Rest assured, Ed Corcoran will be the person on the phone, at your door and at your home or construction site. The job isn’t done until both parties are satisfied! 

Being particular about a job well done is something you would hope to see in all lines of work, especially when it comes to work done in your home or business space. 
Ed Corcoran is at the top of his profession with not only his exceptional work ethics and project creations, but his applied creativity and problem-solving skills- which are a necessity in this field. 

No need to call anyone else either – Ed has top notch professionals in every field at his fingertips waiting for his call should you need additional services to your project such as electrical or painting.

Don’t be disappointed ever again. Make one more call to Corcoran Construction and it will be the last one you need to make!


General Contractor & Handyman Services
    Ed Corcoran    -Master Carpenter 
    corcoranconstruction77@gmail.com 
    289-527-3146

Three generations of Commitment, Passion, and Experience are what form the backbone of ONE94. Coming from a strong Italian heritage in stone and tile, Spencer quickly developed a real passion for construction and design. After being fully trained in stone and tile by his father, grandfather, and uncle, Spencer made the decision to officially expand his company by licensing himself and ONE94 as contractors. 
Today ONE94 holds true to the commitment, passion, experience, and Italian heritage that led to its founding. From start to finish, our goal is to make sure you're so happy with our work that you'll call us back for future projects!

We Guarantee you'll be happy with our work!

profile:
MAXLOR Custom Homes & Renovations is a premier construction company with over 25 years of experience. We provide our customers with a solution to their vision(s). We’re dedicated to providing excellent service while meeting the budget that’s set out for the project.

THE ORIGIN OF MAXLOR
The dedicated MAXLOR team, Stephanie and Salomon, use their experience and expertise to complete outstanding remodel and renovation projects.  As a dynamic husband and wife team, they are passionate about honest work and dedicated to their family company, MAXLOR Custom Homes and Renovations. The company was born out of a desire to live the entrepreneur lifestyle and to create a legacy for their four children.  The MAXLOR name is a combination of their son’s names, Maximiliano and Lorenzo, representing the strength and pride they share as a family unit. MAXLOR Custom Homes and Renovations is a company built on integrity.  Salomon brings over 25 years of building experience and a love of intricate carpentry to every project he works on.  Stephanie prides herself on sharp communication skills, strong organizational skills, and the ability to manage a project schedule with precision.  This unstoppable team has the perfect mix of knowledge and talent to design, build and manage a range of remodel, renovation and addition projects.

THE MAXLOR ADVANTAGE
The MAXLOR advantage is the opportunity to work with a team of experts that offer a transparent approach to home remodeling and renovation.  This talented team delivers exceptional quality with a final reveal that is nothing short of divine.  At MAXLOR Custom Homes and Renovations, there is great pride in bringing the client’s vision to life.  

PROUD MEMBER OF LIONSGATE DESIGN COLLECTIVE
The Collective is a curated collection of talented designers, decorators, contractors, home professionals and support staff. We tackle any project and make it easy for you to sit back, relax and make your vision come true. For over 10 years Lionsgate Design Inc. has grown in the business to bring you a carefully vetted team ensuring your project is handled with the greatest knowledge, expertise and style. Any project, large or small, with our full-service team, you're in good hands! https://lionsgatedesign.ca/ 

THE COLLECTIVE CONNECTION PROCESS
We created The Collective Connection Process™ based on our experience working with thousands of clients over many years. We’ve learned that some people do not achieve the best outcomes with their interior designer or contractor because they did not connect first with what they really wanted emotionally. We call this The Disconnected Design Trap™. When you fall into this trap, you waste a lot of time and money, feel stressed, and worried and ultimately do not achieve your vision. This is why we created The Collective Connection Process™.  To get a better outcome, we learned it's important to connect first with what you really want emotionally. By engaging in a Collective Connection Conversation you are taking the first step to avoid the Disconnected Design Trap.  You will feel more relaxed and confident. And you will achieve your vision. Schedule a conversation - https://calendly.com/collectiveconnectionconversation

profile:
We provide full-service Residential and Commercial Renovators and Remodeling Services to help you improve your home or business. 
 
We are FULLY INSURED with WSIB company with few years of experience with a team of professional members in each and every aspect. 
 
At Reno For Less, we've built our livelihoods on remodeling people's homes from the simple to 
 
the lavish, we've experienced it all and we can help you every step of the way. 

NO JOB IS TOO SMALL OR TOO BIG for our knowledgeable crews. We've happily done it for all of our clients.


@ Basement Finishing & Remodeling: 

Whatever you dream let Reno for Less take full design control to create a brand new basement space. 
Once complete, you can sit back, relax and be thankful you left it in the hands of a professional. 
we do it for you from the design then Permit and then all the way to give the key of your dream new space to enjoy it   .


@ Flooring : 
We professionally install all the following:
- Hardwood 
- Laminate 
- Engineered Hardwood 
- Vinyl tile 
- Porcelain tile 
- Ceramic tile 
- Baseboard and Trim

- Change carpet steps to a solid wood steps . 
- Switch wood spindles (pickets ) to iron. 
- All railing work 

@ Interlocking and Landscaping : 
- Interlock 
- Natural Stone 
- Retaining Walls 
- Steps 
- Deck 
- Landscape Design. 
- interlock sealing ( power wash , polymeric sand application, Sealing will give the shine wet look of your beautiful interlock ) . 
- Interlock Repair and re-level the uneven or sunk areas 

@ Full Kitchen and Bath Renovation: 
- Build a new bath 3 or 4 pieces (Toilet , sink , shower and bathtub) from scratch or flip the existing one, ( all Plumbing work will be done by a fully insured ,license and experienced plumbers crew . )
- Backsplash 
- Floor tiles 
- Counter tops 

@ Commercial Services: 
- Office renovations and remodelling 
- Dental offices - Medical offices 
- Restaurants

- Leasehold improvements 
- Industrial spaces 


@ Painting 
- Residential panting
- Wallpaper
- Industrial Painting, 
- Epoxy Floor Coating 
- Commercial Spray Painting Service for Manufacturing Plants
- Industrial Factories & Warehouses

Plumbing Services
@ We providing all the plumbing services , it is all done by a fully insured ,license and experienced plumbers crew . 

Electrical Services 
@ Adding  > new spot lights, new receptacle outlets, new switches and much more … ALL DONE by a license electrician with many wears of experience

profile:
Superior LGC was founded in 2012 with a vision to offer a high-quality and convenient one-stop-shop company for residential and commercial property owners. It started off as a landscaping company and thanks to our loyal customers, the dream to expand into the general contracting sector became a reality.
Our promise to you
If you can dream it, we can make it a reality. Is your yard in need of attention? We can work to make it exactly how you envision it. Need someone to maintain it on a regular basis? We’re also here for you! Need to renovate your home? We’re also capable of taking care of that. In fact, we demolish and rebuild homes.
Give us a call or send us an e-mail today, you’re one step closer to achieving your goals on your dream property!

profile:
Fixall Restoration is a locally owned and operated disaster restoration company located in Etobicoke. Although our office is in Etobicoke, our restoration professionals operate in all Greater Toronto Area, including Vaughan,  Mississauga, Brampton, Markham, etc.

We clean and restore properties damaged from flood, fire, smoke, mold. Our team is certified and licensed in the emergency restoration field.

We also have lots of experience in the restoration field in houses and businesses all around GTA and northern Ontario.

Our responsibility is to inform and communicate with you about all cleaning and restoration procedures we follow. Also we are here to answer any other questions you might have for us. We offer restoration services 24/7 according to your needs.

Our team of skilled contractors will work closely with you, listening to your needs and guiding you through the entire process from conception to completion, turning your vision into reality.

profile:
Bianka Design&Build is a full service design and remodeling firm serving Great Toronto Area. Providing complete kitchen and bathroom remodeling, Bianka Design&Build has everything you need from design and supply to installation. We strive to deliver the best in high-value services at the right price for you.

At Bianka Design&Build, we are equal parts builder and designer. Whether you’re looking for modern, traditional, contemporary, rustic or any style in between, our team of interior designers will work with you to identify the look that’s right for your space while our builders execute that plan to create a look that corresponds to your individual taste. Our mission is to provide the highest level of service and quality. There’s not a single design challenge or building constraint that our builders can’t overcome or find a solution for. We treat each remodeling project with the same care we’d want for ourselves, and we’re committed to creating spaces that look and feel the way our clients envision.
